Package core

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Bot
    Represent a bot.
    BotSuggestion
    Represent the suggestion of move made by the bots.
    CentralServer
    Manage the list of resources.
    CentralServerResource
    This class will handle the call from the client to the central server and will send the answer.
    CentralServerResourceDeployer
    This class deploies the CentralServerResource on a Grizzly Server.
    DatabaseManager
    A master class for all database manager.
    EndingsDatabase
    Represent a database of endings.
    EndingSuggestion
    Represent the suggestion of ending move made by a databases.
    GamesManager
    Handle all the accesses to the game SQLite table.
    MoveSuggestion
    The model for all suggestion of move (from databases or bots).
    OpeningsDatabase
    Represent a database of openings.
    OpeningSuggestion
    Represent the suggestion of opening move made by a databases.
    PropertiesManager
    Handle the properties of the software such as the listening port or the timeouts.
    Resource
    The model for all resources (databases and bots).
    ResourcesManager
    Handle all the accesses to the SQLite database for the resources.
    StatsManager
    Handle the statistics about every parameters used for score computation (for openings mainly).
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    Statistic
    Enumeration of the statistics used by StatsManager.
